item.description: For the night owls in the group!  Bowl by laser light into the wee hours of the morning.  The cost will be $17 per person, and I will need a final count to confirm the reservation a week early, so please get your RSVPs in early.  Please make suggestions for a pre-bowling dinner and drinks location, and we can get the fun started early.
item.how_to_find_us: We will leave our info at the front counter, and they can direct you to our group

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Galactic Bowling!
